siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
blogPost.body: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
blogPost.title: Goodnight Journal 2.0 - Facebook for journaling
blogPost.author: Arman

localize.description: 每个人的个人日记应用程序，在这里您可以与其他人联系！“晚安日记”是唯一一款提供现代设计的个人日记应用程序，它可以在任何设备上工作，具有社区功能、聊天功能和促进心理健康的功能。
每個人的個人日記應用程序，在這裏您可以與其他人聯繫！“晚安日記”是唯一一款提供現代設計的個人日記應用程序，它可以在任何設備上工作，具有社區功能、聊天功能和促進心理健康的功能。

previous.excerpt: A live dashboard of how the COVID-19 vaccine is being administered across the globe.
previous.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker - See what’s the progress administering the vaccine globally

localize.description: 一个关于冠状病毒疫苗在全球范围内如何接种的实时仪表盘。
localize.tagline: 看看在全球范围内接种疫苗的进展情况

localize.description: 一個關於冠狀病毒疫苗在全球範圍內如何接種的實時儀表盤。
localize.tagline: 看看在全球範圍內接種疫苗的進展情況

next.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
next.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一个Safari扩展，它用你的待办事项取代了Twitter广告。它根据你的提醒创建吸引眼球的帖子，然后这些帖子会被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在将您推向您的意图…远离末日卷轴。
localize.tagline: 用您的待办事项替换Twitter广告

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一個Safari擴展，它用你的待辦事項取代了Twitter廣告。它根據你的提醒創建吸引眼球的帖子，然後這些帖子會被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在將您推向您的意圖…遠離末日卷軸。
localize.tagline: 用您的待辦事項替換Twitter廣告
